name: JJ's Family Restaurant
text:
JJ's Family Restaurant
Tuesday to Friday 11:30am - 6:30pm • Take out & Dine in
(807) 622-5211 - 112 Centennial Square
www.jjsfamilyrestaurant.com
VIETNAMESE BOWLS
Served with spring rolls, lettuce, cucumber, shredded carrots, peanuts, & fish sauce
Buttermilk Chicken Rice Bowl..........................$21.99
Buttermilk Chicken Noodle Bowl.....................$21.99
Beef Rice Bowl................................................$21.99
Beef Noodle Bowl............................................$21.99
Shrimp Rice Bowl.............................................$23.99
Shrimp Noodle Bowl........................................$23.99
Beef & Shrimp Rice Bowl................................$24.99
Beef & Shrimp Noodle Bowl...........................$24.99
SPECIALTY POUTINE
Wonton Poutine (side of deep-fried wontons)...................................$19.95
Thanksgiving Poutine (turkey, stuffing, cranberry)
Buttermilk Chicken Poutine
Chicken Ball Poutine
Spring Roll Poutine
KIDS MEALS
$10.99
Wontons & Chicken Fried Rice
Chicken Fingers & Fries
Hot Dog & Fries
CANADIAN
Fries....................................................................$8.99
Poutine..............................................................$11.99

CHINESE SPECIALTIES
Egg Roll (1)........................................................$3.99

Deep Fried Wontons (20).................................$15.99
Chicken Fried Rice.............................................$12.99
SOUP
Consommé Soup (24oz, side of crispy noodles)..............................$6.99
Large Wonton Soup (8 wontons, BBQ pork, side of crispy noodles, 24oz broth)........$11.99
Special Wonton Soup (8 wontons, soft noodles, BBQ pork, carrot, broccoli, side of crispy noodles, 24oz broth)....................................$16.99
Special Greens Soup (soft noodles, BBQ pork, mixed veggies, side of crispy noodles, 24oz broth)....................................$16.99
Special Wonton Soup with Shrimp (8 wontons, shrimp, soft noodles, BBQ pork, carrot, broccoli, side of crispy noodles, 24oz broth)....................................$19.95
OLD FAVOURITES
#3: Chicken Fried Rice, Eggroll, Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls.....................$21.99
